text: William Wood (29 June 1910–1958) was an English professional footballer who played in the Football League for Blackburn Rovers, Burnley and Mansfield Town. ==References== Category:1907 births Category:1958 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:English Football League players Category:Blackburn Rovers F.C. players Category:Burnley F.C. players Category:Mansfield Town F.C. players Category:Chorley F.C. players Category:Darwen F.C. players
title: William Wood (footballer, born June 1910)
